question: Two pipes can fill a cistern in 3 hours and 4 hours respectively and a waste pipe can empty it in 2 hours. If all the three pipes are kept open, then the cistern will be filled in :
explanation:
Part of the cistern filled in 1 hour = $latex \\frac{1}{3}+\\frac{1}{4}-\\frac{1}{2}&s=1$
(Cistern filled by 1st pipe + Cistern filled by 2nd pipe - Cistern emptied by 3rd pipe )
$latex =>\\frac{4+3-6}{12}=\\frac{1}{12}&s=1$
Hence, the cistern will be filled in 12 hours.
So option [B] is the right answer.
